name: RPG Sortie!
description:
In order to play:

1. Extract the zip file into a folder of your choosing

2. Launch the .exe

Ever been over-encumbered in an RPG before? So have we!

So we made a game all about gamifying the process of organizing one's inventory.  Stack and combine items to stuff as much crap in your bag as possible. The more you store the higher your score!

+ Features a locally saved leaderboard

Created by Rob FF and Karie H
